What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. I use the rapacious one to attack the enemy
2. I do X amount of damage
3. I get X amount of Eldrazi Spawn tokens but I can't sacrifice them in the second phase What is the expected output? What do you see instead? What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.21 Please provide any additional information below.

The fix for issue 129 should have fixed this bug too. After I applied that fix I was able to sacrifice an Eldrazi Spawn in the same turn it came into play.
Will be in 1.22
